dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.customer.bill.CustomerBillFormat
dataStructure.description:
A detailed description of the way in which a customer's bill is presented. The current version of this entity serves as a placeholder. It will be further developed in a future version of this document.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: CustomerBillFormat

child.name: name
child.description:
A short descriptive name.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: name

child.name: description
child.description:
A description of the bill format.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description

child.name: customerBillPresentationMedia
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..*

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association CustBillFormatAppearsBasedUpon

This association end is optional
child.label: customerBillPresentationMedia

child.name: customerBillSpec
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation shared

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association CustomerBillSpecAppearanceBasedUpon

This association end is optional
child.label: customerBillSpec
